mapper.select:
select
distinct
'true' as QUERYID,
from user
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into user (open_id, session_key, city, province, country, avatar_url, gender, age, user_email, nick_name, user_postal, user_birthday, user_iphone, realname, card_id, qr_code_url, user_idevice, user_form, user_count_num, user_is_not, user_last_ip, user_login_num, user_login_address, create_time, last_visit_time) values (#{openId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sessionKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{country,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{avatarUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gender,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{age,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userEmail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nickName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userPostal,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{userBirthday,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{userIphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{realname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cardId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{qrCodeUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userIdevice,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{userForm,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{userCountNum,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{userIsNot,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{userLastIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userLoginNum,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{userLoginAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{lastVisitTime,jdbcType=BIGINT})
